title: Vevo launches dedicated app for watching music videos on Android TV and Google TV
content:
Officially available as of today, Vevo is launching its huge network of music videos to Google TV and Android TV in a new app.

more…

The post Vevo launches dedicated app for watching music videos on Android TV and Google TV appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Vevo has officially launched its music video app and new interface on Google TV and Android TV devices in select countries.
